issue.title: [Rust] Integrate memory pool abstraction with rest of codebase
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2620](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2620). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A memory pool abstraction was contributed but is not actually used by the rest of the code base.

We should either remove it or integrate it.

If we integrate it, it should be done in a similar way to the C++ API.
